articles.author: Bill Chappell
articles.title: Billions from Russia's frozen assets will go to help Ukraine's military, the EU says - NPR
articles.description: Under the plan, the European Union will send as much as $3.25 billion in profits from frozen Russian assets to Ukraine to help finance its military and reconstruction efforts.
articles.content: A man waves to a taxi as he leaves the Russian Central Bank headquarters in downtown Moscow last summer. The EU approved a plan this week to use interest from hundreds of billions of dollars' worth o… [+3461 chars]
